entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 06:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: SE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
